name_clarification: This will be the name we will use to wait for you at the meeting point.
phone_clarification: It is important to add the international prefix.
additional_info_placeholder: e.g., need a child seat, extra luggage...
is_modification_label: Is this a modification of an existing booking?
booking_success_message: Booking successful! We will contact you shortly to confirm.
booking_error_message: There was an error submitting your booking. Please try again later.
confirm_booking_alert: Are you sure you want to confirm this booking and send an email to the client?
cancel_booking_alert: Are you sure you want to cancel this booking?
booking_update_error: There was an error updating the booking.
email_body_intro: Your taxi booking has been confirmed. Please review the details below to ensure they are correct.
email_body_outro: If you need to make any changes or have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us.
email_farewell: Thank you for choosing our service!
email_query_body_intro: We have a query regarding your booking with ID {id}:
prices_content_1: 77€: Monday to Friday (6:00 to 21:00) and Saturdays (6:00 to 14:00).
prices_content_2: 88€: Monday to Friday (21:00 to 6:00), Saturdays (14:00 to 6:00 on Sunday), and Sundays (all day).
prices_content_3: The price is approximate and for one-way travel. All our taxis have a taximeter, and the price is per vehicle, not per person.
capacity_content: Our taxis can accommodate 4 people + driver.
return_transfer_content_1: Book your return transfer to the airport with us! We guarantee a punctual service at the best price, with no hotel or agency commissions.
return_transfer_content_2: To book your return transfer, we need: Pickup location and time (usually 3 hours before your flight departure).
return_transfer_content_3: Important! Avoid unofficial offers for airport transfers. They may be more expensive, include hidden fees, and lack insurance.
return_transfer_content_4: If any driver offers alternative services via WhatsApp or SMS, please inform us immediately.
faq_question_1: What is the pickup process at the airport?
faq_answer_1: Our driver will be waiting for you in the arrivals hall with a sign with your name on it. We monitor flights, so don't worry if your flight is delayed. Meeting point at the airport: Located next to the baggage claim area (Gate C, column 4), in the center of the hall, marked with a "Meeting Point" sign.
faq_question_2: Can I pay by credit card?
faq_answer_2: Yes, all our vehicles are equipped with credit card terminals. You can also pay in cash if you prefer. You cannot pay in advance, each service is paid to the taxi driver at the end of each journey.
faq_answer_3: You can cancel your booking at any time by notifying us by email, phone, or Facebook.
faq_answer_4: If you need a baby seat or booster, please let us know in advance. We have seats for all ages. If you want something special, let us know in the additional information.
login_error: Login failed. Please check your credentials.
email_update_body_intro: Your booking has been modified. Please review the updated details below to ensure they are correct.
email_update_body_outro: If you agree with the changes, please reply to this email with 'OK'. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us.
driver_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this driver?
